titles: Ane acte anent the registring of saisings, reversiones, and some vther writtes, for the better tryall o[f] the falsettis daylie invented and occurring within this realme
author: Scotland.
notes: At head of title: Apud Falkland vltimo die men[?]s Iulij, anno. Dom. 1599.
Imperfect: creased and torn with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
